author: Melody Ann Carey
text: 'Love their Greek Salad. Food is fresh.'

author: Kevin Stapleton
text: 'It was excellent!!'

author: Jerseyorkreviews Jerseyorkreviews
text: 'You are truly blessed if you eat here
column5: no place like Greek town.'

author: Deirdre Jefferson
text: 'Delicious gyro platter. Not too salty. Authentic. Will go again.'

author: Young C
text: 'Definitely needs improvement in attending to customers more than their take out orders. The aura was not to impressive thou it seemed clean. It was hot inside even with ac running. To my surprise the food was delicious. No fats on pork dishes and gyros. Enjoyed it very much and will return hoping the service will improve and the restaurant is kept cool next time.'

author: cristina marin
text: 'Feta cheese with honey... absolutely amazing! Great food!'

author: Alex Kogan
text: 'Only did a take out. Mediocre food at best. I think they precut the Giro meet in the am and then serve it throughout the day.'

author: Anastasia Milyutina
text: 'Delicious!'

author: Dylan Felix
text: 'Extremely good food here and very friendly service. Outdoor dining + a pocket park across the street! Liquor store nearby
column5: byob.'

author: Anthony Nappi
text: 'Gyro was soggy
column5: mystery meat in gyro
column6: watery tzatzki... pathetic ‚ÄúGreek‚Äù food.'

author: Paulo Santiago
text: 'Always great food and ppl the chicken soup there is delicious.'

author: Shamsher Sachdeva
text: 'I found the meat to be severely over cooked. But the vegetables (raw) were fresh. The sauce was tasty but salty.'

author: aria pollard
text: 'Greek food and the setting here is super good. The food was tasty. Looking forward to coming back with my relatives. I see why this place has so many great reviews.'

author: Alex Vega
text: 'I live two doors down from Greektown. This was about my seventh time time calling to order pickup at 8:50pm and was told they were already closed. I would never leave a review like this but I  was so taken back from whomever the girl I spoke with that I will never come back here.'

author: Jelizaveta Busygina
text: 'Food never arrived.'

author: Cassandra Fleming
text: 'Greek food
column5: yeah
column6: so delicious. The service was very kind and attentive. The prices are well within reason for the quality.'

author: Mark E
text: "Fast friendly service. Had the beef and lamb yeero. It was flavorvorful but slightly dry. If I can't go NYC
column5: this would be my first choice. Surprisingly the old school Greek diners in Jersey City/ Hoboken area serve bland gyros."

author: John
text: 'Ill make it short sweet and to the point
column5: by far the best greek food in north jeresy
column6: the portion sizes are amazing espically for the price
column7: fries are beyond good staff veey nice

author: Bernadette Sarlo
text: 'Delicious food'

author: David Reagan
text: 'The portion sizes are great. Get extra sauce. Other than that
column5: the food is pretty good and a decent quality. Not the best Greek food
column6: but solid and worth it for the price point.'

author: William Brent Rudderham
text: 'They got the order wrong
column5: delivery guy had to make 2nd delivery for missing item. Soggy fries and calamari. For this much money you should expect more.'

author: Alex Staunton
text: 'Great neighborhood spot and most of the entrees are enough to feed two people.  My go to for me and my wife is the spicy feta dip and a yeero platter and we usually have left overs.'

author: Shant Marootian
text: 'Average Greek food'

author: Laura Ortiz
text: 'The dishes are delicious and fresh!'

author: Abby Washuta
text: "Great service. Straightforward menu that was well prepared and well priced. And who doesn't love a byo?"

author: Teo Baiza
text:
"Loved it ‚ù§Ô∏è
My first time here and I'm definitely coming back.
The server was really nice and sweet and I have to mention that it was almost the closing time.
The food is cheap and tastes good!"

author: Scott McCown
text: 'Fantastic Greek food. I‚Äôm an especially big fan of the Greektown salad. Always fresh. Always delicious.'

author: Sven Dehner
text: "Worst Greek I've ever eaten.\nThe meat was dry and had no flavor
column5: ist was also cold.\nIm here for vacation and only because of this place a lost an entire day because I had to puke 4 times.\nWant my money back"

author: Tameka
text: 'Food was good
column5: decent! But it didn‚Äôt have the flavor I was looking for
column6: meat seemed a bit bland!'

author: Ronnie Feise
text: 'Ordered (2) Greektown Yeeros and had them delivered through Chowtown.  After an hour and a half I called to see where it was. I was told the driver was running late and would arrive in 5min.  He did but the food was ice cold.  I ordered (2) "bottles" of coke for $2.50 each and received cans.  The gyro was large and the tasted pretty good(the only reason I gave 2 stars) given the temperature  but I kept biting into pieces of bone or something that was so hard my fiance chipped her tooth on it.  Definitely wont be eating here again.'

author: William Saunders
text: 'Holy cow this yeero is great!'

author: Nick Zappulla
text: 'Amazing gyro with the freshest pita bread and  tzatziki sauce I‚Äôve ever had for a very reasonable price. Try the Greektown with fries in the pita!'

author: Dan Mastroianni
text: 'Best lunch in Hoboken!!'

author: Carlos Orjuela
text: 'Good'

author: Lucas Reis
text: 'I love the food and the service. Highly recommended!'

author: Joan Lazar
text: 'Food is consistently amazing. Service is just right. A little pricey but rightfully so.'

author: asa james
text: 'This place is Awesome!  Great food and a great team!'

author: John Chae
text: 'Amazing food!! Mike the owner is very nice.'

author: Onecccm76
text: 'Too expensive for the portion they give u'

author: Bernie Ching
text: 'love this place.  delivery is fast and food is delicious.  for something other than kebabs/gyros
column5: our current favorite is the grilled seafood entree.'

author: Allan Lazenby
text: 'The portions were enormous
column5: and the falafel was good.'

author: Jennye cordova
text:
'(Translated by Google) My favorite place excellent food

(Original)
Mi lugar preferido excelente comida'

author: Oda Simi
text: 'Place is ok.  Chicken in the "yeero" was a bit on the dry side. Rice was a bit bland.  Decent tzatziki sauce. Dessert was excellent. Staff was nice and decor is average.'

author: JCC X
text:
'(Translated by Google) Fantastic gyros!

(Original)
Fantastic gyros!'

author: Aziz Mee
text: 'Dry
column5: plain-flavorless chicken skewers sandwich. Probably pre-cooked.  I was asked if I wanted a french fries with it. And there was literally 4 fries inside the sandwich.  I was in lunch time and no wander the whole place was empty.'

author: Hen Pastry Chef
text: "Authentic Greek food
column5: like the one you would find in Greece! Everything is delicious especially the fried feta cheese with sesame and honey
column6: delicious!! A lot of vegetarian options besides meet and chicken options. Good salad big fresh cut
column8: I have been to Greek many times and I can say it's definitely authentic
column9: also there is Greek music in the background. The service was fantastic."

author: Neko Daniel Ferro
text: 'Outstanding gyros (yeeeos). Everything was perfectly cooked. The fries have a nice lemon touch to them that are just delicious.'

author: kakhi chiqovani
text:
'The Best foood in town!!! i come here 2-3 times a week ! food is amazing ! portions are insane ! quality fresh food EVERY TIME I VISIT THE GREEKTWON!! i will say this loudly this is the best restaurant in hoboken! service is always outstanding! food good as it‚Äôs can get !!
Hamide provides the best service. always ! she is an amazing person and amazing server ! always on top of everything! love coming here when she is in! Thank you Greektown for amazing outstanding Food and service!

Grilled chicken platter is my favorite! comes with salad and french fries  ! and Yes the dessert BAKHLAVA OMG !!! just OMG !!!'

author: Daulet Nurmanbetov
text:
'Attentive and fresh Greek food!
Portions are large and delicious. Me and my wife forth 2 appetizers and 2 plates. Which we ended up taking home and resting for next 2 days üòÅ

The place is BYOB and a liquor store is conveniently located across the street making this spot a great for dates or friend get togethers.

Service was quick and attentive.
Overall we would be coming back here.'

author: Cesar Barrios
text:
'(Translated by Google) I like it

(Original)
Me gusta'

author: Alex Higgins
text: 'Yummy!!! Very nice place and very tasty food!!!'

author: Jorge Murillo
text: 'I really liked this spot ! The food was delicious ! The service was fast and the server was very nice. I would deff come back ! :)'

author: Levi
text: 'Good food
column5: but order ahead as it takes them a long time to prepare food
column6: even for their lunch specials'

author: Tommy C
text: 'Generous portion  Of salad.. amazing staff ..love this place'

author: Mike mavro
text: 'Fresh greek food best gryo in Hoboken'

author: Pamela Lee
text: 'Fantastic food
column5: service is awesome
column6: portions are huge'

author: Pearl Stars
text: "I'm never disappointed with this place. Good for casual dinning on a week night."

author: Mr. Smiley
text:
"Ordered the Yeeros (Greektown Gyro) plate that was suppose to come with French fries......and the delivery person showed up to my suite with a cold Yeeros sandwich with about 5 or 6 individual stale french fries stuffed inside my sandwhich.... ..üòÇü§£....LOL!.   You think I'm lying. I swear it! I should have taken a picture but i had already warmed it up and changed the way it looked by taking it out it of the wrapper and all.
***REPLY FROM OWNER AND TO OWNER***

Yes I ordered the Greektown Gyros but what's your excuse for delivering the food cold to me with stale french fries inside? And from what I see on other bad reviews in the past
column5: this isnt the first time."

author: Morris Goldberg
text: 'Good food'

author: bob mcinturff
text: "outstanding food and Server was wonderful can't say enough good things"

author: Otabek Yusupov
text: 'Food was delivered in 2 hrs and was cold'

author: Bogdan Gologan
text: 'Mediocre at best.'

author: kobi pinto
text: "It's was good meal the service was good the pita was nice but the meat was dry they need to use more cheeseziky."

author: Matt Watkins
text: 'Great food!'

author: Hatem Gawaly
text: 'Cozy and friendly place'

author: Life Life
text: "It's ok"

author: Andrew Fixell
text: "One of the nicest staffs I've ever come across
column5: their avgolemono chicken soup is top-notch. Huge portions that are super tasty and always full of fresh ingredients. My favorite Greek spot in Hoboken
column6: hands down."

author: Jason Manenkoff
text: 'This place is trash. One of the worst gyros I‚Äôve ever eaten
column5: the falafel was over fried and dry
column6: the soup was like gravy. This was for pickup
column7: we waited there and then drove 6 blocks and everything was like warm-cold. Wish ‚Äúit‚Äôs Greek to me‚Äù was still in Hoboken. This was my second time here. First time sucked but figured I‚Äôd give them another chance. Oh well.'

author: Kanita Hadzovic
text: 'Great!'

author: Ïù¥Ïòà / YiYE
text: "(Translated by Google) (eng below) Food is very salty... Fresh and healthy Greek food If you'd expect

column7:
this won't be it. Me and my friend got sick after eating from here. DONT GO by only looking at good reviews. The service is also sub par.

author: Chankyu Kim
text: 'I had the worst service in my life. There was one server on dinner tables
column5: and he was just staring at NFL games lol. The food was also not worth the price
column6: salty and dry food.\nNever go to this place unless you want to ruin your evening at Hoboken :)'

author: David Neves
text: 'Food was delicious
column5: we just had to wait order and pay during the busy time'

author: Sara Kelley
text: "Absolutely love this place. Love the food and the staff are courteous and helpful. Always make it a point to visit when I'm in town!"

text:
'(Translated by Google) Very good. Cozy place and very good food.

Muito bom. Lugar acolhedor e de muito boa comida.'

author: Michael Bubb
text: 'Had a nice meal with family
column5: spacious comfortable and good food'

author: Kyle Lukas
text: 'Best Greek in hoboken'

author: tommy curran
text: 'Great food .. nice staff'

author: Tom Lucek
text: 'Food is excellent'

author: Cynthia Ellison
text: 'Great greek food!'

author: ghizlane ilbeyli
text: 'This place does not deserve 4.6 stars. The food is worst that any Greek/Mediterranean restaurant I have been to.\nOn a busy Sunday
column5: they had one server taking care of 7-10 tables .'

author: William J Sisti
text: 'Great Great platters and sandwiches. Good spot for lunch.'

author: Kerry Petratos
text: 'Just love the Greek food and music!'

author: Christian Ramirez
text: 'Great food. and Excellent service. Waitress there makes it enjoyable and is a delight. She is extremely helpful and descriptive about the menu. Good was exactly we had hoped. Fresh and delicious.'

author: Puneet Mahajan
text: 'Love the food here'

author: Erik Conetta
text: "An amazing meal from start to finish.  Grilled Octopus was phenomenal! I'd recommend this place to anyone.  Enjoy."

author: Behzad Ahmadi
text: 'Good service but the food was not warm'

author: katya austin
text: "Mediocre food but fantastic service. Our waiter is the only reason for 4 stars
column5: food barely passed for 3. I don't recommend pork platter
column6: btw."

author: Mantha Tsopanoglou
text: 'Great food. We order the mixed grill for 2 and it was huge. Lovely staff as well!'

author: Pete Kostakis
text: 'Food and service consistently good.'

author: David W. Astor
text: 'Chicken Greektown (lunch menu) is the best!'

author: Rachel Ortiz
text: 'Went here with my friend who has been here before numerous times and he highly recommended it. I was not disappointed. I had the shrimp pita and it was delicious! The ingredients are top notch and so very fresh. The pita was loaded with beautifully cooked shrimp
column5: simply delightful. The service is truly in point.'

author: Anton Leskovets
text: 'Good food and BYOB'

author: Mark Cisco
text: 'Cheap and very good'

author: Augusto Portugal
text: '(Translated by Google) Very tasty
column5:
super quiet. Good price. Very well maintained environment

(Original)
Muito gostoso
column6: super tranquilo. Bom pre√ßo. Ambiente muito bem cuidado'

author: Andrew G
text: "Their food is great - sometimes outstanding - and not too expensive
column5: and their delivery (through Grubhub) is lightning fast. Due to the preponderance of lean protein
column6: gains
column8: theoretically this food won't kill you ‚Äî surely some kind of feat for Hoboken-bound delivery."

author: Licia Mcclary
text: 'We finally got here and we are so glad we did.  Cozy place on the corner which made parking pretty easy ( big plus in Hoboken).  As soon as you walk in you feel at home by their greeting to you.  Service was impeccable thank you Hamida!  The food in a word FABULOUS!  Started with the Chicken Avgolemono soup which I must say is the best I have ever had.  We love Greek food and there is nothing in the area that could satisfy or even pass for decent Greek until finding this place.  Honestly
column5: you MUST stop in and try this soup.  We also had the Greektown Chips- fried zucchini and eggplant with a little grated cheese and a side of tzatziki.  The combo of the grated cheese and tzatziki on the little fried slice is just delicious.  Next we had to try a traditional Yeero
column6: very yummy
column8: great portion and again that fabulous fresh tzatziki.  I had the pork chops with greek fries and grilled veggies.  nice hard grill on the chop
column9: I squeezed the lemon on top which they had on the plate and it was quite nice.  Grilled veggies were tomatoes
column11: eggplant and red peppers and it was really good.  The greek fries were crispy and cooked perfect.  The only thing I would add is more lemon to the plate which after being here I know Hamida would bring you a plate of lemons if you ask her to!  Overall extremely satisfied we finally have a Greek place we can go to.  They also deliver yay!  We will be back

author: zhengbo zou
text: 'Great food at this place! The decoration is also beautiful.'

author: Justin McPharison
text: 'Some of the best Greek food I have had.'

author: Mehrdad Nosrati
text: 'A hidden gem in Hoboken. Delicious and yummy food. The food portion was more than enough with a reasonable price. Their service was excellent and the ambiance was very peaceful. I definitely recommend this place.'

author: NANCY WOODRUFF
text: "Excellent Greek food! Can't wait to go back."

author: John Burke
text: 'Great food and service at reasonable price. Friendly.'

author: Paul Leon
text: "Was expecting a lot more from a restaurant named Greek Town. Waiter didn't appear to know the menu. Dolmades were listed as grape leaves
column5: no baklava
column6: said they were out.\nDolmades were good though
column9: lamb chops decent.\nFor a Greek- American it' wasn't Yia-Yias house."

author: Rebecca Juras
text: 'Great service and great food. Plus a nice location between Jersey City and Hoboken.'

author: K Rodriguez
text: "Tzatziki was amazing
column5: big portions
column6: good flavors and reasonable prices. Service could've been better and there was little orange chunks of fat all over my salad (I'm guessing from refrigerated dressing where the fat had risen to the top)
column7: it was gross and I ended up just eating the meat on the salad and throwing the rest away."

author: steven soprano
text: 'Clean
column5: cozy
column6: inside and outside cafe style seating.  Fresh ingredients

author: Luca Bessi
text: 'Quite original. Good but very greasy food. Be prepared :-)'

author: Alex Biles
text: 'Really good.  I got the Greektown Yeero which was lamb and beef but also with french fries (fat sandwich style).  It was delicious.  The absolute perfect mixture of vinegar and flavors that really complimented the food.  Reasonably priced for take out as well.'

author: Iris Valle
text: "I have ordered from GreekTown about 7 times for delivery and went once in person. The delivery is always on time and the food is always hot and delicious. The orzo is perfectly al dente and the chicken GreekTown is delicious with spinach
column5: orzo and tomatoes. The Yeero's are always a winner and if you're in the mood for a GreekTown salad
column6: you cannot go wrong here. Fresh and delicious."

author: Rokotoff
text: 'Recommended!!!'

author: Kaye Lynnelle
text: 'Had the chicken gyro with fries lunch special. The fries are delish! Greeted by Mike who was so friendly. Definitely the place to go for Greekbin Hoboken.'

author: Jason DeLeeuw
text: 'Quiet nice place relaxful atmosphere'

author: Dina Racc
text: 'The food is great
column5: delivery is fast
column6: and the prices are really good!'

author: Jose Avalos
text: "Love the food. Mike is always very attentive. Been there at least 6-7 times since they've opened and have enjoyed it every time. Glad they deliver now too for those lazy or cold and rainy days."

author: Patricia Brewer
text: 'Poor customer service! I ordered through grubhub and they sent the wrong item. I called to make them aware and they tried to tell me I ordered wrong when I most definitely did not. Food was sub par... never going to order there again.'

author: Diana Ferny
text: "I typically don't write reviews but GreekTown Hoboken has the best Greek food around... have been here several times... food was delicious (we've tried the app platter
column5: octopus
column6: yeeros
column8: and the baklava-was hands down the best i've had)

author: Matthew Goczalk
text: "Now I can finally say I've had Greek food that isn't greasy."

author: Michael Nilson
text: 'Hands down best restaurant in Hoboken. Try the new chicken gyro!! And be sure to save room for dessert(s)!'

author: Heran Haile
text: 'Great food
column5: quick service
column6: generous portions. Happy to have found them!'

author: Maria Pelaez
text: 'I have been here twice now and the second time was even better than the first! I had the Chicken Greek Town and it was sooo good! My husband had the grilled seafood which he loved! Definitely coming back here again!'

author: Peter Paslis
text: 'Best Greek food in the area. Very authentic. The place is clean and the service is great!'
